name: Inventory Management System
description: A modern inventory management system built with Blazor MAUI Hybrid. Supports Google Sign-In, Supabase storage, and MongoDB integration.

name: Weather App
description: A cross-platform weather app fetching live data from OpenWeatherMap API with support for dark mode and temperature unit toggle.

name: Music Player
description: A Blazor Hybrid music player app with audio playback, shuffle/repeat, and timeline slider control.

name: E-commerce Storefront
description: A mobile-first e-commerce app with product listings, a shopping cart, and a secure checkout process powered by Stripe.

name: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task manager with drag-and-drop boards, due date reminders, and real-time updates using SignalR.

name: Recipe Finder
description: An application that allows users to search for recipes by ingredients, view nutritional information, and save their favorites.

name: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website built with Next.js for server-side rendering, featuring a contact form and animated page transitions.
